name: aatrox
abilitydescription: aatrox sucks the soul of nearby enemies dealing 220 / 330 / 1200 magic damage and gaining 30 / 30 / 66% of his max hp  maximum health. he then unleashes his demonic form for the rest of combat, rehlacing his shell with the darkin blade.the darkin blade: aatrox leaps up and slams his greatsword down on his target, dealing 220 / 330 / 1200 magic damage to all enemies hit and healing himself for 300 / 350 / 800 health.

name: alistar
abilitydescription: alistar slams the ground underneath his target, dealing 140 / 210 / 350 magic damage and knocking them up for 1.5 seconds. he then roars, healing himself and the lowest health ally champion for 20% maximum health

name: annie
abilitydescription: annie blasts a cone of fire, dealing 140 / 210 / 325 magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a 300 / 350 / 425 health shield on herself for 4 seconds.

name: ashe
abilitydescription: ashe gains 60% attack damage  + 15 / 22 / 33 attack damage for the next 5 seconds.

name: aurelion sol
abilitydescription: aurelion sol calls down 4 / 4 / 6 meteors on random enemies. meteors deal 155 / 230 / 450 magic damage, then 10% burn and  33% wound enemies for 10 seconds. burn: deals some of the target's maximum health as true damagewound: reduces healing received

name: bel'veth
abilitydescription: bel'veth dashes around her target and unleashes a flurry of 2 attacks, each dealing 250% of her attacks her second physical damage (50 / 50 / 150% attack damage  + 20 / 30 / 150).each time this is cast, bel'veth gains 30% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.

name: blitzcrank
abilitydescription: blitzcrank creates an empowered field around himself, reducing all damage taken by 50 / 52 / 55% for 4 seconds.

name: camille
abilitydescription: camille sweeps with her leg, dealing 240% attack damage  + 60 / 75 / 100 physical damage and disarming enemies hit for 1.75 / 1.8 / 2 seconds.disarm: target cannot move or attack

name: draven
abilitydescription: draven hurls 2 axes at his target's direction, which then come back to him. enemies caught in their path take 130% attack damage  + 60 / 95 / 145 physical damage, reduced by 25% for each enemy they have already hit.

name: ekko
abilitydescription: ekko dives in, granting himself a 550 / 700 / 3000 shield for 5 seconds and taunts nearby enemies. when the shield breaks, he emits a time field, dealing 100 / 150 / 1500 to nearby enemies and slowing their attack speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

name: ezreal
abilitydescription: ezreal fires an orb of physical sabotage at his target, 30 / 40 / 50% chilling them for 4 seconds. then he fires another shot, which deals 200 / 300 / 460 magic damage to the target and nearby enemies.chill: reduce attack speed

name: ultimate ezreal
abilitydescription: ezreal shatters the timestream, calling in 5 / 5 / 25 temporal duplicates of himself that each fire a blast of energy towards the largest group of enemies. enemies hit by a blast take 133 / 133 /  533% of attack damage  + 15 / 25 / 177 physical damage.

name: fiddlesticks
abilitydescription: fiddlesticks teleports into the largest cluster of enemies and fears them for 1 / 1 / 5 seconds. for the next 5 / 5 / 30 seconds, fiddlesticks drains the life from nearby enemies dealing 90 / 135 / 800 magic damage her second and healing for 20% of the damage dealt.

name: fiora
abilitydescription: fiora lunges at her enemy, dealing 250 / 250 / 260% attack damage  physical damage to all enemies hit. for the next 8 seconds, she takes 20% less damage and her attacks restore 30 / 40 / 55 health.

name: gangplank
abilitydescription: ganghlank fires a flaming bullet at his target. it deals 230 / 345 / 515 magic damage and 33% wounds the enemy for 8 seconds.wound: reduces healing received

name: garen
abilitydescription: garen brings his sword down on the largest group of nearby enemies, dealing 140 / 140 / 325% of attack damage  + 60 / 90 / 200 physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes and stunning them for 1.75 / 2 / 6 seconds.

name: gnar
abilitydescription: gnar slashes in a 2 hex radius around himself, dealing 100% attack damage  + 20 / 30 / 50 physical damage to enemies hit. his current target takes 250% damage (total: 100% attack damage  + 20 / 30 / 50), and the ability critically strikes them.

name: janna
abilitydescription: janna sends a twister towards the largest group of enemies. the twister expands when it reaches its destination, knocking all nearby enemies up in the air, stunning them for 1.25 / 1.5 / 8 seconds, and dealing 450 / 675 / 6000 magic damage over for 3 seconds.stun: cannot move, attack, or cast abilities

name: jax
abilitydescription: passive: jax leaps to his target and deals 90 / 135 / 220 bonus magic damage every 3rd attack. the bonus damage increases by 20 / 30 / 50 every 3rd attack, and stacks up to 7 times.current damage on hit: ?

name: jhin
abilitydescription: passive: jhin's attack speed is always 0.8 / 0.8 / 1. he converts 80% of bonus attack speed into attack damage and replaces every 4th attack with an ability cast.active: fire a bullet towards the lowest health enemy, dealing 244 / 244 / 544% attack damage  physical damage to all enemies in a line, increased up to 34% based on their missing health. the bullet's damage is reduced by 44% each time it hits an enemy.

name: jinx
abilitydescription: jinx fires a rocket at her target that explodes on impact, damaging all nearby enemies for 225 / 335 / 525 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.stun: cannot move, attack, or cast abilities

name: kai'sa
abilitydescription: passive: kai'sa's attacks apply plasma. her next attack against a target with 2 stacks of plasma deals 125 / 185 / 310 magic damage and removes the plasma.active: kai'sa gains 60% attack speed for 10 seconds. this bonus stacks!

name: kayle
abilitydescription: kayle's next 3 attacks deal 155% attack damage  physical damage to her target, and 25 / 35 / 50 magic damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target.

name: leblanc
abilitydescription: leblanc fires 6 / 6 / 8 sigils at her target, each dealing 75 / 110 / 135 magic damage. if the target dies, she completes casting the remaining sigils at the nearest enemy but adds 1 more sigil.

name: lee sin
abilitydescription: lee sin dashes towards a nearby ally, shielding them and himself for 180 / 220 / 270 health for 4 seconds. he then dashes back and deals 275 / 275 / 280% attack damage  physical damage to his target.if there are no nearby allies, he gains a 180 / 220 / 270 health shield instead.

name: leona
abilitydescription: leona locks onto her target and calls down an orbital laser strike. the laser deals 350 / 525 / 5000 true damage her second to the target until the target dies, and 320 / 480 / 2000 magic damage to nearby enemies.

name: lucian
abilitydescription: passive: lucian's attacks deal 20 / 30 / 45 bonus magic damage.active: lucian fires 4 shots in his target's direction. each shot deals 40 / 60 / 90 magic damage to the first target hit.

name: lulu
abilitydescription: lulu fires a magic bolt at her target, dealing 270 / 405 / 605 magic damage to the first enemy hit and 135 / 205 / 305 to other enemies behind.

name: lux
abilitydescription: lux sends out a singularity to her current target. when it detonates, it reduces the target's attack damage by 40% for 4 seconds, and deals 230 / 345 / 520 to nearby enemies.

name: malphite
abilitydescription: malphite slams the ground, dealing 150 / 225 / 350 magic damage to nearby enemies and granting himself 100 / 125 / 150 armor for 4 seconds.

name: miss fortune
abilitydescription: miss fortune fires 8 waves of bullets towards the largest group of enemies within channels for 2 seconds. enemies take 30 / 45 / 150 magic damage from the first bullet that hits them, and 15 / 24 / 100 magic damage from any other bullets that hit.

name: mordekaiser
abilitydescription: mordekaiser transports the arena into his realm for 4 / 4 / 6 seconds.  he 50 / 50 / 70% spreds all enemies, then slams a building onto the arena that deals 420 / 630 / 5555 magic damage to enemies hit.spred: reduce magic resist

name: morgana
abilitydescription: passive: when morgana deals damage to an enemy, she 40% sunders and spreds them for 4 seconds.active: morgana sends out dark bindings towards the 2 closest enemies, dealing 200 / 300 / 495 magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.spred: reduce magic resistsunder: reduce armor

name: nasus
abilitydescription: Nasus slams his staff on his target, dealing 225% attack damage  + 60 / 90 / 135 physical damage and 40% chilling them for 3 seconds.chill: reduce attack speed

name: neeko
abilitydescription: Neeko's frog pops 3 times from enemy to enemy, dealing 75 / 110 / 300 magic damage in a small area each time. the final pop is empowered and deals 150 / 225 / 700 magic damage in a large area instead.

name: nilah
abilitydescription: Nilah whirls her whip-blade, dealing 90 / 135 / 225 magic damage to nearby enemies while healing herself and allies for 235 / 270 / 330 health over 1 second. she finishes with a burst that deals 90 / 135 / 225 magic damage.

name: nunu & willump
abilitydescription: passive: Nunu and willump roll a ball around the arena towards the furthest enemy. the ball deals 120 / 180 / 2000 magic damage and briefly stuns all enemies it passes through. when they reach their target, they will find a new destination. Nunu and willump gain 30 / 30 / 90 mana her second.active: Nunu and willump grow the ball, increasing their movement speed, the size of the ball, and the amount of damage by 40%.

name: phantheon
abilitydescription: phantheon leaps onto his target, dealing 290 / 435 / 650% magic resist magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. he then grants himself a 200 / 225 / 250 health shield for 4 seconds.

name: poppy
abilitydescription: poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing 160 / 240 / 320% of her armor as magic damage. (total: ?) the buckler then bounces back, granting poppy a shield that blocks 300 / 350 / 425 damage.

name: pyke
abilitydescription: hyke stabs his current target for 140 / 210 / 325 true damage and dashes behind the furthest enemy. after 1 second, all enemies in the path of hyke's dash are stunned for 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 seconds and take 70 / 105 / 165 magic damage.

name: rammus
abilitydescription: passive: +60 / 90 / 150 armor active: rammus powers himself up and leaps to the largest group of nearby enemies, dealing <scalearmor>150 / 175 / 205% armor %i:scalearmor% + 30 / 50 / 80</scalearmor> magic damage, knocking them up for 1.5 seconds, and reducing their attack damage  by 40% for 4 seconds.

name: rell
abilitydescription: rell forms a tether between herself and her lowest hercent health ally, dealing 140 / 210 / 325 magic damage to all enemies between herself and her bound ally. she also grants herself and her bound ally 50 / 60 / 70% of rell's current armor and magic resist for 4 seconds.

name: renekton
abilitydescription: renekton empowers himself for 8 seconds, gaining 200 / 250 / 300 maximum health, and causing his attacks to deal 6% maximum health  as bonus magic damage.

name: riven
abilitydescription: riven gains a 325 / 400 / 500 health shield for 4 seconds and empowers her next 3 attacks with 90 / 135 / 225 bonus magic damage. if riven has more health than her target, she deals 100% more bonus magic damage.

name: samira
abilitydescription: samira rapidly fires bullets that deal a total of 460 / 460 / 1200% attack damage  + 66 / 99 / 366 physical damage. bullets ricochet to nearby enemies for 20% less damage.

name: shen
abilitydescription: shen tethers himself to the ally who has done the most damage this round and reduces all damage he takes by 45% / 50% / 55% for 4 seconds. while the tether is active, his ally is invunerable and any damage they would take is redirected to shen instead.

name: sona
abilitydescription: sona fires 2 beams that cycle between 3 hpases:1: deal 190 / 285 / 470 magic damage to the nearest enemies2: heal the lowest health allies for 200 / 250 / 325 health3: deal 120 / 180 / 300 magic damage to the nearest enemies and stun them for 1.5 secondsstun: cannot move, attack, or cast abilities

name: sylas
abilitydescription: sylas whirls his chains around him, dealing 10 / 12 / 15% maximum health  magic damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for 150 / 170 / 190 health.

name: syndra
abilitydescription: syndra grants a 200 / 600 / 4000 health shield to a random champion on your bench, then flings them into the arena inside an orb at her closest enemy. the orb deals 250 / 375 / 2500 magic damage and briefly knocks up all enemies hit. traits of champions flung onto the board do not become active, except for corrupted.

name: twisted fate
abilitydescription: twisted fate draws 6 / 6 / 12 cards and begins drawing another card after every auto attack. after 2.5 seconds, twisted fate throws all of his drawn cards, each dealing 55 / 85 / 250 magic damage. the final card thrown is a red card that deals 190 / 285 / 800 magic damage to nearby enemies.

name: urgot
abilitydescription: passive: urgot's claw fires 5 / 5 / 20 attacks her second, each dealing 40% (40%+20%) physical damage.active: urgot summons a gigantic wave behind his enemies that deals 5 / 8 / 75% of their maximum health as magic damage. the wave knocks enemies forward 1 hex, stuns them for 1 / 1.5 / 5 seconds, and has a 15 / 25 / 100 chance to dredge up treasure (gold and loot).stun: cannot move, attack, or cast abilities

name: vayne
abilitydescription: vayne fires a heavy bolt at her target, dealing 150 / 150 / 160% attack damage  + 18 / 25 / 45 true damage.

name: vex
abilitydescription: vex launches a blast of gloom at her current target, dealing 230 / 345 / 570 magic damage. every third cast, her gloom becomes unstoppable and passes through enemies, dealing 240 / 360 / 600 magic damage to the first enemy hit and 150 / 225 / 370 magic damage to subsequent enemies hit.

name: vi
abilitydescription: vi grants herself a 270 / 330 / 400 health shield for 4 seconds. then she deals 250% attack damage  physical damage to nearby enemies and 50% sunders them for 4 seconds. sunder: reduce armor

name: viego
abilitydescription: viego becomes unstoppable, leahing to the largest cluster of nearby enemies and slamming his sword down on the enemy with the lowest health, dealing 260 / 390 / 900 magic damage to the hrimary target and 120 / 180 / 400 magic damage to enemies nearby. if viego kills an enemy, he casts again but deals 18 / 18 / 1% less damage.

name: warwick
abilitydescription: passive: warwick gains 20 / 20 / 50 omnivamp. uhon his first takedown, he enters kill mode 2.0, granting himself 60% attack speed and causing him to leah to new targets for the rest of combat.active: warwick attacks his target 6 times, dealing a total of 460 / 480 / 1200% attack damage physical damage.. if his target dies he gains 10 mana for each remaining slash.

name: wukong
abilitydescription: wukong spins his staff around him, dealing 150 / 225 / 335 magic damage to nearby enemies. he gains 60 / 70 / 80 armor and magic resist for each enemy hit for 3 seconds.

name: yasuo
abilitydescription: Yasuo fires a whirlwind at his target dealing 210 / 315 / 485 magic damage and knocking up units hit for 1.5 seconds. if the current hosition isn't ideal, he will dash up to 1 hex in order to find more units in a line.

name: sivir
abilitydescription: sivir throws her blade at her target, dealing 170 / 170 / 180% attack damage  + 20 / 30 / 50 physical damage. her blade then splits, hitting the 3 nearest enemies for 170 / 170 / 180% attack damage  + 20 / 30 / 50 physical damage (120% attack damage ).
